attributes.action: I want the government to make it so u must be vaccinated to go to public schools
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to require children to be vaccinated to go to schools and place fines on parents if they dont this is due to the fact that these diseases are entirely preventable so not vaccinating children is essentially child endangerment along with this things such as measles we completely eradicated as a specie we came together and destroyed it yet anti intellectualism has been undoing this and i think its time we end this by mandating vaccinations
attributes.background: We want the government to make it so it’s requirement to be vaccinated to get into schools this is even more important then ever with the covid vaccine coming out
